body:
Comment 6: 
how do you propose to implement the new api?
if it's not already running on main thread,
then it might not be possible to migrate it
to the main thread. (e.g. we can't interrupt
code on the main thread if it's blocked in
syscall or just doing for {})

this is part of the reason why the current
api locks the current thread: you need to
actually run on that thread to lock it.
